comments:
build I20040318

Got the following on startup.  This lead to subsequent errors (see other stacks
below).  This even caused the Workbench to fail starting up, for which I'll file
a separate PR.  The Workbench should be able to recover from any view failing.

Tried again.  Got the first two stacks above again.  The workbench succeeded in
coming up this time, but the Sync view showed that there was an error in
creating it.  Closed it and reopened it.  It took some time, then got an error
again.  The log has some new stack traces:

Just realized that I probably launched the sessions above with the I20040219
build by accident.  I closed the sync view, shut down and restarted with
I20040318, reopened the sync view, and all seems well.
This bug was fixed a long time ago. If it is user error, just close the bug.
